hero.heading: Safe & Reliable Towage Services
hero.description: Celebrating over 35 years of excellence in harbour towage and workboat services throughout the Auckland area.

about.heading: About Kaipara Tow Boats
about.paragraph1: Kaipara Tow Boats is a family-owned business established in 1988, providing harbour towage and workboat services within the Auckland area.
about.paragraph2: The company has expanded its fleet of tugs and barges with increasing demand, as well as the area of operations. Since its formation, the company has established a reputation as a reliable, safe quality towage operator.
about.paragraph3: With a good track record and high levels of skill, coupled with an honest can-do attitude, Kaipara Tow Boats maintains its fleet of vessels to a high standard, available 24/7.

services.name: Harbour Towage
services.description: Professional towing services for vessels of all sizes within Auckland harbour and surrounding waters.

services.name: Barge Services
services.description: Reliable barge transportation and positioning for marine construction and cargo operations.

services.name: 24/7 Availability
services.description: Round-the-clock service ensuring your maritime operations never stop, emergency response available.

services.name: Marine Construction Support
services.description: Specialized support for marine construction projects with experienced crew and well-maintained equipment.
